page.title: 01OVERVIEW OF THE AREA
page.content: THE{BUILT UP AREA OF ARMADALE}IS SURROUNDED BY COUNTRYSIDE WHICH LENDS ITSELF TO CROP FARMLAND AND GRAZING LAND.THE TOWN OF APPROX.10000 INHABITANTS IS{MAINLY WORKING CLASS}IN CHARACTER.THE MAJORITY OF{HOUSES}ARE RENTED FROM LOCAL AUTHORITIES AND SCOTTISH SPECIAL HOUSING ASSOCIATION. TWO PRIVATE HOUSING ESTATES OF APPROX.160 HOUSES IN TOTAL ARE LOCATED TO THE N.W. OF THE TOWN. THE{INDUSTRIAL BASE}IS LIGHT ENGINEERING AND MANUFACTURING,SHOPPING FACILITIES CATERING SATISFACTORILY FOR AVERAGE FAMILY REQUIREMENTS(EARLY CLOSING WEDNESDAYS). A REGULAR{BUS SERVICE}CONNECTS ARMADALE TO ITS NEIGHBOURING TOWNS, EDINBURGH AND GLASGOW.VISITORS TO THE AREA CAN ENJOY A VARIETY OF RECREATIONAL ,EATING AND BED AND BREAKFAST FACILITIES.
